name: Sentiment Analysis Configuration
description: Configuration for sentiment analysis of Google Play reviews

review_text.description: The full text of the review to analyze

include_suggestions.description: Whether to include improvement suggestions in the analysis

sentiment_scale.description: The scale to use for sentiment classification

overall_sentiment.description: The overall sentiment classification of the review

positive_aspects.description: List of positive aspects mentioned in the review

negative_aspects.description: List of negative aspects mentioned in the review

improvement_suggestions.description: Suggestions for improvement based on the review

user_experience_summary.description: A brief summary of the user's experience

input.review_text: This app is mostly good but has some annoying bugs. I love the interface and how easy it is to find what I'm looking for. However, it crashes at least once a day and sometimes loses my saved data. Would be 5 stars if these issues were fixed.

improvement_suggestions: Fix stability issues to prevent crashes
output.user_experience_summary: The user generally appreciates the app's design and usability but is frustrated by technical issues that impact reliability. They indicate willingness to give a perfect rating if the stability problems are resolved.
